pyyaml

[:python_version < "3.8"]
numpy<1.20.0

[:python_version == "3.6"]
scipy<1.6.0

[:python_version == "3.7"]
scipy<1.8

[:python_version > "3.7"]
scipy>1.6.0

[:python_version >= "3.8"]
numpy

[docs]
elstir
mkdocs-material

[plots]
matplotlib
panel

[testing]
pytest>=4.6
pytest-checkdocs>=2.4
pytest-flake8
nbmake
